job description:
Hands-on individual with extensive knowledge on building BI & DW Solutions.Build Reports, Dashboards, ETL interfaces for data transfer, replication (Setting up of Disaster Recovery environment)Analyze the data to derive the information/relationships stored in it and to use it in a meaningful way to make it easy for Business users to utilize that data for their reporting needs.Develop reports to support business needs and help in improved decision making.Extensive experience in data warehousing and business intelligence, analysis, design, development, testing and implementation of the reporting and ETL components.Lead brainstorming sessions with senior management to gather requirements and to identify gaps and major pain points.Coach business teams on features, challenges and benefits of specific tools.Tracked project milestones and deliverables. Developed status reports, requirements documentation and presentations. Longstanding experience working for large hi-tech corporation clients.Strong team player with excellent communication skills to work in a team and individual environment. - provided by Dice Build Reports, Dashboards, ETL interfaces, BI & DW Solutions
Associated topics: data engineer, data quality, data scientist, data warehouse, database, database administrator, hbase, mongo database administrator, sybase, teradata
